content:
After the upgrade to Supernova, You can not use it for previous Versions. However, You made a backup! - Stop TB - De-install it - replace Your upgraded profile by Your backup copy - -re-install TB 102

worked for me.

HTH, Thomas
creator: thomas.eifert

content:
Okay, a techy friend appeared and has accepted the exception based on a soon-to-be transfer of my email from my ISP to another company, The Messaging Company, which I have agreed to previously. Though there is no word this has started ...

For any other Aussies with iiNet moving to The Messaging Company, using Thunderbird, may be useful.
creator: becbecbec

content: I am not sure, but this sounds like a problem with your device logging into the server mail account to download. Have you changed or updated anything recently? If not, (or even if so!) can you check the configuration of you email downloads is still correct? If you can download emails to phone, are there any that are too big or 'not ordinary' > and if you do not need them, delete them using the phone? You may need to contact the server ISP and check that the configurations are correct, unless you still have their set-up instructions. Best of luck, David
creator: d.church

content:
If you click the Unread button on the Quick Filter Bar, and also click the pin icon at the left end of the bar, the filter is retained when opening other folders.

To show Original html, use v. 9 of this add-on.

Filter on Folder Button
creator: sfhowes
